pr_title: Support overriding prefix of @ConfigProperties at the injection point

timeline.message:
Support overriding prefix of @ConfigProperties at the injection point

Resolves #9136

Support overriding prefix of @ConfigProperties at the injection point

Resolves #9136

Co-authored-by: Manyanda Chitimbo <manyanda.chitimbo@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: This annotation transformer is redundant - ConfigPrefix is a qualifier and so it should be handled by io.quarkus.arc.deployment.AutoInjectFieldProcessor.
timeline.author: mkouba

timeline.bodyText: There is no need to use the getters for @Singleton beans - you could save quite a few lines of code ;-).
timeline.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText: It would probably make sense for other tests as well. But it's just nitpicking ;-).
replies.author: mkouba

replies.bodyText: Yeah for sure. When I need some very low effort task to do, I'll clean the rest up as well :)
replies.author: geoand
